Diamond.en: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.
Diamond.de: Attacke mit Schallwellen. Verwirrt den Gegner eventuell.

O.Ruby.en: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

A.Sapphire.en: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

Sun.en: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
Sun.de: Der Anwender labert das Ziel zu und greift es mit den dadurch entstehenden Schallwellen an, wodurch das Ziel verwirrt wird.
